name: Arkadiko USDA
description: The Arkadiko protocol trustlessly provides stable loans backed by Stacks Tokens (STX), known as USDA. In order to mint USDA, you need to over-collateralize Stacks (STX) tokens into an Arkadiko Stacks Vault. In other words, USDA is a stablecoin, existing to maintain relative price stability in volatile markets.
